headline: AGILENT VARIAN TURBO CART PUMPING SYSTEM
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model Turbo Pumping System
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 1,167.8 CFM (32,999.1 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 9.98E-11(En) torr (1.33E-10 mbar)
Inlet Flange Conflat 203.2 mm (8.000 in)
Exhaust Flange ISO-K 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Backing Pump Model PTS06001UNIV
Roots Pump Model Turbo V-551
Accessories
Conflat 8" to BellJar plate adapter with four 2.75" conflat side ports.
BellJar plate can be replaced with standard flange, inquire please.


Other Information
Agilent (Varian) Triscroll 600 backing pump, P/N: PTS06001UNIV
Agilent (Varian) V551 turbo pump with 8" conflat inlet flange P/N 9698923
Agilent (Varian) TV550 turbo pump controller
Varian SenTorr BA2C Vacuum Gauge Controller with RS232 port,
can control (1) Bayard-Alpert ion glass gauge and (2) ConvecTorr gauges (included)
System is set for 120VAC operation, request change to 240VAC when ordering if required.

Power Requirements 120/240 V 15.0 A 8.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
